author: rdonkin
msg: Moved mailets into standard-mailets. Unfortunately, some existing mailets are coupled to abstract superclasses which were moved. Perhaps these could be moved into mailets-base then standard-mailets could become a deployment dependency only.

author: markh
msg: o Fix potential recursion in hashCode with parent.hashCode by using parent's artifact only
o Aligned equals to also use parent's artifact only

author: pgier
msg: [MRELEASE-173] Fix a bug with handling the individual module versions.
